Headline: Temporary #3 King Drive Reroute at King Drive/60th
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted near King Drive/60th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via King Drive, 61st, Prairie, 59th, King Drive, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near King Drive/60th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at Harrison/Racine
ShortDescription: #60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, Taylor, Halsted, Harrison, due to street blockage near Harrison/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine,Taylor, Halsted, Harrison, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Harrison/Racine.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #7 Harrison Reroute near Harrison/Racine
ShortDescription: #7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Harrison/Racine,

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Harrison/Racine, 

Eastbound buses will operate via: Harrison, Ashland. Jackson, Halsted, then resume their normal route.

Westbound buses will operate via Harrison, Morgan, Van Buren, Racine, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
